tr.td: DT.IMMZ.D2.DT.Cholera.WC-rBSvaccine3doses
Decision Table Determine required vaccinations
draft
WHO
computable

div.p: WHO recommendations for routine immunization – summary tables (March 2023) (1)

tr.td:
Client is not due for cholera vaccination: Client is not due for cholera vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
For WC-rBS vaccine (Dukoral), 3 doses should be given to children aged 2–5 years.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for cholera vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with cholera dose as client's age is less than 2 years. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first cholera dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is due for cholera vaccination: Client is due for cholera vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
For WC-rBS vaccine (Dukoral), 3 doses should be given to children aged 2–5 years of age, with an interval of 1–6 weeks between doses.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for cholera vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with cholera dose as no cholera doses have been administered. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is not due for cholera vaccination: Client is not due for cholera vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for cholera vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with cholera dose as the latest cholera dose was administered less than 1 week ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is due for cholera vaccination: Client is due for cholera vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for cholera vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with cholera dose as the latest cholera dose was administered in the last 1 to 6 weeks. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is not due for cholera vaccination: Client is not due for cholera vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for cholera vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with cholera dose as the latest cholera dose was administered less than 1 week ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is due for cholera vaccination: Client is due for cholera vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for cholera vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with cholera dose as the latest cholera dose was administered in the last 1 to 6 weeks. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is due for cholera vaccination: Client is due for cholera vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due" "Completed the booster series" (where "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines") = FALSE when dose 1 is administered
If interval since last dose ≥ 6 weeks, restart primary series.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for cholera vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with cholera dose and restart primary series as the latest cholera dose was administered more than 6 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Primary series is complete. Client is not due for cholera booster dose: Primary series is complete. Client is not due for cholera booster dose "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due" "Completed the booster series" (where "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines") = TRUE
Revaccination is recommended where there is continued risk of Vibrio cholerae infection. For WC-rBS vaccine, children aged 2–5 years revaccination is recommended within 6 months. If less than 6 months have passed, 1 dose for revaccination.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Primary series is complete. Client is not due for cholera booster dose
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with cholera dose as the latest cholera dose was administered less than {Member States defined lower limit} days ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Primary series is complete. Client is due for cholera booster dose: Primary series is complete. Client is due for cholera booster dose "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due" "Completed the booster series" (where "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines") = TRUE
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Primary series is complete. Client is due for cholera booster dose
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with cholera booster dose as the latest cholera dose was administered less than approximately 6 months ago. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is due for cholera vaccination: Client is due for cholera vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due" "Completed the primary vaccination series" (where "Vaccine type" = "Cholera vaccines") = FALSE when dose 1 is administered
For WC-rBS vaccine, children aged 2–5 years revaccination is recommended within 6 months. If more than 6 months have passed, the primary series of 3 doses should be repeated.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for cholera vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with cholera dose and restart primary series as the latest cholera dose was administered more than approximately 6 months ago. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
